dt: {bc}an examination formerly required for matriculation as an undergraduate at Oxford

et: Middle English {it}responcioun{/it} response, sum to be paid, from Anglo-French or Medieval Latin; Anglo-French {it}responsion{/it}, from Medieval Latin {it}responsion-, responsio{/it}, from Latin, answer, from {it}respondēre{/it}
shortdef: an examination formerly required for matriculation as an undergraduate at Oxford
